name: Big Bad Bunnies From Another Dimension
name_original: Big Bad Bunnies From Another Dimension
description:
• Dimensions have clashed and killer bunnies are invading the world!
  • Play as a group of friends at a house party, each with unique abilities.
  • Activate game altering effects drawn from the Ring of Chaos.
  • Climb the waves, buy new weapons and hold out as long as you can!

BBBFAD is a co-op, twin stick wave survival game, developed as a 12 Week Game Jam project by 8 students at the University of Huddersfield

Team members:

  • Aaron Cant: Prototyping, rigging, skinning, animation, programming

www.aaroncant.com

  • Lewis Banks: Characters, UI, generalist

www.artstation.com/lewismorganbanks

  • Lauren Westcott: Concepting, character, props, 2D

www.artstation.com/laurenkiseop

  • Brad Cullen: Environment, props, level design

www.artstation.com/bradcullen

  • David Shields: Character, props

www.artstation.com/dshieldsy26

  • Oliver Mcgrath: Environment, props, level design

www.artstation.com/olivermcgrath

  • Josh Pritchard: Programming 

www.joshmakes.games

  • Reece Parrinder: Environment, props, level design 

www.artstation.com/reeceparrinderdesign

  • Abbie Howard: Music, SFX

www.abieo.co.uk

  • Tyler Cline: Music, soundtrack

www.soundcloud.com/tylercline

The game can be played single player or with up to 3 other friends locally. 

We recommend using Parsec to play online with others:

https://parsec.app

NOTE: Current build is an unfinished testing build, to be completed in the coming weeks. Certain features might be broken or missing.
